ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "I tried this recipe for some friends who had requested my German potato salad. I didn't have time to make in on the spot so I gathered my ingredients and put it in a slow cooker. They loved it!"
ins:
Combine potatoes, onion, celery, green bell pepper, oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low 5 to 6 hours. Garnish with bacon and parsley.
